resources.string: Icons made by srip from www.flaticon.com
"Welcome to Talki! \n Talki helps you talk to your friends in loud places (bars, parties, concerts...)\n All you need to do is follow this quick tutorial"
"Here you have 3 common prefixes of sentences. \n Press on one of the option to open the next window"
"After pressing on the preferred prefix, you can choose from the options above. \n LONG PRESS let you change the default text to your own text :) "
"According to your choice, the sentence will display on your screen. \n Show it to your friends for easy communication!"
"You can erase all of your changes and restore the text to default"
